remove-node.path:
/api/package[@name='com.adjust.sdk']/interface[ not(@name='OnAdidReadListener' or @name='OnAmazonAdIdReadListener' or @name='OnAttributionReadListener' or @name='OnAttributionChangedListener' or @name='OnDeeplinkResolvedListener' or @name='OnDeferredDeeplinkResponseListener' or @name='OnEventTrackingFailedListener' or @name='OnEventTrackingSucceededListener' or @name='OnGoogleAdIdReadListener' or @name='OnIsEnabledListener' or @name='OnLastDeeplinkReadListener' or @name='OnPurchaseVerificationFinishedListener' or @name='OnSdkVersionReadListener' or @name='OnSessionTrackingFailedListener' or @name='OnSessionTrackingSucceededListener'
or @name='IOnAdidReadListener' or @name='IOnAmazonAdIdReadListener' or @name='IOnAttributionReadListener' or @name='IOnAttributionChangedListener' or @name='IOnDeeplinkResolvedListener' or @name='IOnDeferredDeeplinkResponseListener' or @name='IOnEventTrackingFailedListener' or @name='IOnEventTrackingSucceededListener' or @name='IOnGoogleAdIdReadListener'
or @name='IOnIsEnabledListener' or @name='IOnLastDeeplinkReadListener' or @name='IOnPurchaseVerificationFinishedListener' or @name='IOnSdkVersionReadListener' or @name='IOnSessionTrackingFailedListener' or @name='IOnSessionTrackingSucceededListener'
)]
